Package Library

Class Kiosk

  • java.lang.Object
    • Library.Kiosk
  • public class Kiosk
extends java.lang.Object
    The Kiosk class is used for processing commands from the console. It allows the user to manage and interact with the library inventory.
    Author:
    Muhammad Faizan Saiyed, Michael Neustater

      • isValidInput

        public boolean isValidInput​(java.lang.String number,
                            int numArgs,
                            int reqArgs)
        Checks for a valid input for operations that modify the state of a book
        Parameters:
        number - String representation of the book number
        numArgs - integer value of the number of comma spliced arguments entered by user
        reqArgs - integer value of the number of arguments expected by the operations
        Returns:
        returns true if the input is valud, false otherwise
